name: Add new subscribers to Emercury audience from Google Sheets
description: Every time a new row is added in a Google Sheet, Make will automatically create a subscriber in Emercury. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l205VTOGWG-wurkvc2UmsbVnN0cJbX-6evHJnWcMfaM/edit#gid=0).
